1.content:
Well here we are about to look into a new adventure about the children of our heroes.

As the story begins the parents begin to drop the children off so that they can leave for the first Flightless Shadow/Major Allen world tour/

The first family to make it to Grimwood's is Spider's.

Sibella and Laci are flying in their bat form carrying Spider making sure not to drop him.

Tannis,Ricky and their daughter Amisi, stop at Grimwood's by cab they just got back from Egypt for the summer.

Steven, Winnie and Marks make it to Grimwood's through a path at the woods.

Alucard Olga and Dracula III fly in together and wait for the others.

Spade Phanty and Acella drive to Grimwood's in Spade's wicked SUV you can tell it's Spades because of the licence plate FullHse


Lastly Sartana III, Elsa and Sartana IV make it to Grimwood's through a portal.

Well everyone it's good to see old students returning to bring their children as new students Miss Grimwood said.

Laci looked up at her mom and started to cry a little bit.

Mom I'm a little scared about going to school and,why can't you guys take us on a world tour. Laci said.

Sweetie we've been over this if you were to come with us you would miss to much knowledge that Grimwood can give you this year. Sibella replied.

And plus this gives you a great chance to make a lot of friends. Spider added.

Now students it's time to prepare for a year here at Grimwood's finishing school.
1.title: A new begining

12.content:
Alright boys and girls the first sure way to start off a good year is to learn about one another to understand the life styles of the students here. Miss Grimwood said.

To make this a little easier for everyone lets start with...Laci. Miss Grimwood continued.

Sniff Well the first thing to know about me is that my nickname is Laci and anyone who calls me by my real name will get me upset, second my daddy taught how to sing and lastly my dream is to start a band like our parents. Laci explained

That's sounds pretty cool actually. Sartana IV blurted out.

Well since you thought that was cool you'll go next right? Laci asked.

Well I guess so. Ok so my Name is Sartana I am the forth in my family started with my great grandpa, I play the guitar alot it helps me because I don't have any friends.

Whoa, why don't you have friends? Dracula asked.

Well the family business get's in the way and before you go any farther the family business is being a demigod helping keep balance between whatever subject we have jurisdiction over.
My family's is between the mythical and human realm.

So your a half god? Acella asked.

No,no Demi is a word in the language of the Heavens translating to follower so technically many humans are demigods as well. Sartana replied and then chuckled at the thought.

Well since you both asked a good question one of you two can go next. Sartana continued.

Ladies first. Dracula said.

Well my name is Acella to follow suit with my father Spade my favorite past time is playing cards, and lastly I love playing my bass guitar. Acella explained.

Alright then My name is Dracula the Third named after my grandfather and his grandfather my family switched between Dracula and Alucard for the men. Second if you wonder why I wear sunglasses I am an albino, and third I play the piano. Dracula explains

That is interesting it would be cool to be in your shoes. Markus said.

Well since you were so nice and gave me a nice pep how about you go next? Dracula asked.

Alright, My name is Markus, I love to play sports, I love to go hunting with my dad, my favorite past time is tomahawk throwing, I can track people and animals,and lastly I play the drums. Markus listed.

Well I'm the last one but My name is Amisi it is an Egyptian name for flower I play both the acoustic guitar and the sitar I wear the same bow my mommy wore when she was my age and I think we are all going to get along nicely. Amisi stated proudly.

Very good now lets all get some rest for tomorrow. Miss grimwood stated.

But tomorrow is Saturday. Sartana whined.

you don't want to be tired when your to have fun do you. Miss Grimwood asked.

No, Miss Grimwood Sartana replied.
12.title: learn about one another

122.content:
it was 11:30 at midnight where Laci woke up hearing a metallic clang come from downstairs
"I wonder who's downstairs this late" Laci thought putting her nightgown on and picking up a microphone stand as a makeshift weapon for last resort as she proceeded walking down the hallway admiring the photos on the wall, the one that grabbed her attention most had a label which read "Class of 1988- Elsa Frankenteen, Sibella Dracula, Phantasma Phantom, Winnie Werewolf, Tannis Mummy" on a gold place and had a picture of her mother about the age of 14 which her childhood friends as she continued walking she saw a shadow ransacking the fridge as she led a quick whack
"Oww. Laci, what the hell" the figure said revealing the be Markus
"Markus, what are you doing?" Laci asked halfway confused, halfway pissed off for him waking her up
"I thought, since we didn't eat dinner, I would make a sandwich you want one" Markus said squirting mustard on a sub he made
"That does sound nice, but don't wake me up like that again" Laci said
"Sorry, dropped a plate Markus said making her a sandwich as he handed it to her
"So Laci, what kind of name is that?" Markus asked confused
"I told you before it a NICKNAME" she said frustrated
"Nickname for what, you never told us your real name" Markus said biting his sandwich as Laci lowered hers on the plate
"Lacramiorara" she slowly relied
"Bless you" he said confused
"No that's my name, it's a mouthful I know, that's why I changed it, but please don't tell the others
"My lips are sealed...Lacramiorara" Markus said as she almost smacked him but he blocked her hand
"I don't see the problem, I think it's a very nice name" Markus said
"Just don't use it, call me Laci only, I'm warning you" Laci said finishing her sandwich heading upstairs
"Oh Markus, one last thing" Laci said getting his attention "put some pants on" Laci said softly giggling as she went upstairs as Markus looked down he was wearing a shirt and boxer shorts as Markus went back to bed. next chapter takes place in
122.title: Midnight Interuption

info.brief_description: The Sequel to the F.S/M.A tour focusing on the children of the characters of the last book
info.description:
Sartana IV Lead Guitarist
Dracula III long silver hair like his father's but rather than caused by a plague that vexed his father he is an albino plays piano
Laci Dracula's cousin and Sibella's daughter Laci is her nickname her birth name is Lacramiorara lastly she is the Lead vocals to the group
Markus Winnie's son Drums to the group
Amisi Tannis's daughter Quiet scholar loves deciphering languages she is on rhythm guitar and Sitar
Acella Spade/Phanty's daughter Bass Guitaristloves pulling pranks regrets it when people are hurt in the process

Major Allen(Alan Johnson)-lead vocals/rythem guitar(age 36) long blond hair typical headbanging metal head(based of Bret Michaels/Ronnie James Dio/Zakk Wylde)
Spade (Alex Crusan)(pronounced crusin')-lead guitar (age32)extremely good guitarist long black hair carefree most of the time(based of CiCi DeVille/Slash)
Spider-bass (age 34) gothic outcast black dreadlocks with tips dyed bloody red wears a red hourglass belt eyes are red due to a rare blood disaise so blood comes out of his eyes when he crys (based off Ozzy/Aice Cooper/Marilyn manson/Murdoc Niccials)
Steven Cannete (pronounced can-it)-drums (age 40)William and winnie's half brother redneck drummer sholder lenth red hair very strong (based off (Axl Rose/Lemmy Kilmister/Billy Idol)
Scarab(Ricky Akmun)(pronounced oak-moon)-Rhythm guitarist (age 29) born in Egypt light brown skin dark brown dreadlocks wears an ankh medalion which he never takes off and can speak egyptian (based of Jimi Hendrix/Prince/Tom Morello/Lenny Kravitz)

The Flightless Shadows

Sartana Dementia:(age 29) Sartana wears a black suit, has and eye patch over what was once his left eye leader of the band and in emergency situations a real Pain in the ass.He's the Lead singer and he plays the accordion
Alucard Dracula:(age 36) Has silver hair wears a jet black suit and his father's amulet.Leader of the band, and is calm as long as no one messes with his family.He plays the violin.
Tittus the Mummy:(age 31) Wears his father's old Pharaoh's Crown and a grey suit over his bandages. Usually the silent one.He plays the electric
William Werewolf:(age 33)Winnie's older half brother Hair goes down right past his eyes, wears a torn suit His loyalty is to Sartana for saving his life.He plays the base
Francis Frankenstein:(age 38) Wears a lime green suit with a pork pie hat, the nice guy of the group.He plays the drums
Phantasmos Phantom:(age 32) wears a white suit and a white fedora The prankster and loyalty is to his friends.He plays the piano/keyboard

The Flightless Shadows are the band in my other story Sartana goes to Ghoul School
Grimwood Girls:
Elsa Frankenteen: (age 34)Daughter of Frankinstein's Monster,)Mentally slow but kind hearted
Sibella Dracula (age 32)-Daughter of Count Dracula, Princess of Vampires, very strongwilled but peaceful
Phantamsa "Phanty" Phantom (age 31)-Daughter of Phantom of the opera,musically talented on pipe organ, loves being funny and making people laugh.
Winnie Werewolf (age 27)-Daughter of the Wolfman/Werewolf, Princees of Werewolves, tomboyish,likes sports,likes howling.
Tanis Mummy (age 24)-Daughter of a Mummy, shy around people but very kind-hearted.
